languages.text: "Ты коснул{mf|ся|ась} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}запретного{/d} и выжил{mf||а}?" {n}В голосе сквозит паника.{/n} "Неудивительно, что тебя так тяжело убить. Но тяжело — не значит невозможно!"
"You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"
languages.original_text: "Ты коснул{mf|ся|ась} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}запретного{/d} и выжил{mf||а}?" {n}В голосе сквозит паника.{/n} "Неудивительно, что тебя так тяжело убить. Но тяжело — не значит невозможно!"

traits.locale_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"
"You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"
"You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"
"You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"
"You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}禁忌{/d}に触れて生き延びただと？」{n}彼の声は動揺が隠せなかった。{/n}「どうりで、なかなか殺せないわけだ。だが、困難が不可能を意味するわけではない！」
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}禁忌{/d}に触れて生き延びただと？」{n}彼の声は動揺が隠せなかった。{/n}「どうりで、なかなか殺せないわけだ。だが、困難が不可能を意味するわけではない！」

languages.text: "Ihr habt das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Verbotene{/d} berührt und überlebt?" {n}In seiner Stimme liegt Panik.{/n} "Kein Wunder, dass Ihr so schwer zu töten seid. Aber schwer heißt nicht unmöglich!"
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Verbotene{/d} berührt und überlebt?" {n}In seiner Stimme liegt Panik.{/n} "Kein Wunder, dass Ihr so schwer zu töten seid. Aber schwer heißt nicht unmöglich!"

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Yasak olana{/d} dokunup sağ mı kaldın?" {n}Sesine panik sirayet ediyor.{/n} "Demek seni öldürmek bu yüzden zor. Ama zor, imkânsız demek değildir!"
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Yasak olana{/d} dokunup sağ mı kaldın?" {n}Sesine panik sirayet eder.{/n} "Demek seni öldürmek bu yüzden zor. Ama zor, imkânsız demek değildir!"

languages.text: «¿Ha tocado lo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}prohibido{/d} y aún vive?». {n}Notas el pánico en su voz.{/n} «Con razón es difícil matarl{mf|e|a}. ¡Pero difícil no significa imposible!».
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha tocado lo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}prohibido{/d} y aún vive?». {n}Notas el pánico en su voz.{/n} «Con razón es difícil matarl{mf|e|a}. ¡Pero difícil no significa imposible!».

languages.text: “你触碰过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}禁忌之物{/d}，而且还活了下来？”{n}他的声音充满了惊惶，{/n}“难怪你这么难对付。不过，难对付不等于杀不死！”
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: “你触碰过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}禁忌之物{/d}，而且还活了下来？”{n}他的声音充满了惊惶，{/n}“难怪你这么难对付。不过，难对付不等于杀不死！”

languages.text: « Vous avez touché l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}interdit{/d} et survécu ? {n}vous demande-t-il d'un ton paniqué.{/n} Je comprends pourquoi il est si difficile de vous tuer.Mais difficile ne veut pas dire impossible ! »
languages.original_text: "You touched the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}forbidden{/d} and survived?" {n}His voice is laced with panic.{/n} "No wonder you're so hard to kill. But hard doesn't mean impossible!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez touché l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}interdit{/d} et survécu ? {n}vous demande-t-il d'un ton paniqué.{/n} Je comprends pourquoi il est si difficile de vous tuer.Mais difficile ne veut pas dire impossible ! »
